runAsContext.description: Zerotier requires root privileges to start the Zerotier process

capabilities.name: NET_ADMIN
capabilities.description: Zerotier requires NET_ADMIN to configure the VPN interface, modify routes, etc.

capabilities.name: NET_RAW
capabilities.description: Zerotier requires NET_RAW to use raw sockets and proxying

capabilities.name: AUDIT_WRITE
capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to write to audit log.

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to chown files.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to bypass permission checks.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: Zerotier is able bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE
capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to bind to privileged ports.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETPCAP
capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to set process capabilities.

capabilities.name: SYS_ADMIN
capabilities.description: Zerotier is able to perform various system administration operations.

attrs.description: CPU limit for Zerotier.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Zerotier.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6
